title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 51.1 - Matriculation reports and qualifying certificates
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 51.1 - Matriculation reports and qualifying certificates

State Regulations

Every professional school or college in the State shall
submit such reports concerning the qualifications of matriculants as may be
prescribed by the commissioner in accordance with the requirements established
by statute or by these regulations. Where a qualifying certificate is required, application for such certificate shall be made on the forms and in the manner
prescribed by the commissioner. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
51.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
